name: J's Racin'
overview: J’s Racing was established in 1988 in Osaka, Japan as a tuning shop specializing in Honda automobiles. Since then, they have tuned hundreds of Honda cars and developed and sold performance / racing products for Honda’s and Acura’s. Well known for their participation in Super Taikyu Racing Series in Japan every year and also known as a Sponsor for many other track events. Their demo cars and their customers’ cars are frequently featured in numerous magazines and DVDs. J'S Racin' is a game using the J'S Racing licenses and features different game modes and cars to drive, the player can also tuning his car before starting each race. Game modes: - Grand Prix - Free race - Time Trial - 2 Player vs mode.
